document_data.name: Skagi
document_data.mainbody: '''Skagi''' was a [[shadar-kai (Netherese)|shadar-kai]] warrior living in the [[Shadowfell]] side of [[Ikemmu]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relations: He was [[Cree]]'s brother and was a close friend of [[Ashok]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Skagi traveled with Cree, Ashok, and [[Vedoran]] on a quest to rescue the [[wizard|witch]] [[Ilvani]] from a shadar-kai enclave in the Shadowfell.

In the {{YearlinkName|1480}}, he journeyed with a caravan to [[Rashemen]] to discover the cause of the visions that were haunting Ilvani.{{Cite digital book/The Darker Road}}
document_data.Description: Skagi had muscular arms and long grey hair. His torso was covered in green tattoos.
